TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit RolePrincipal extends System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class RolePrincipal Inherits ClaimsPrincipal Implements ISerializable

summary.span: 表示目前 HTTP 要求的安全性資訊，包括角色成員資格。

span.span: Represents security information for the current HTTP request, including role membership.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會實作介面，並表示 HTTP 要求的目前安全性內容。The object implements the interface and represents the current security context for the HTTP request. 啟用角色管理時 (請參閱)、指派物件屬性 。When role management is enabled (see ), the assigns a object to the property of the . 類別會公開目前 HTTP 要求的安全性識別和此外會執行的角色成員資格檢查。The class exposes the security identity for the current HTTP request and additionally performs checks for role membership. 如果是`true`，然後在物件會管理快取的角色清單，並查閱中的快取的目前使用者的角色成員資格然後首先，列出角色。If is `true`, then the object manages the cached list of roles and looks up role membership for the current user in the cached list first, then the role . 如果是`false`、物件一律會查閱使用的角色提供者的角色成員資格。If is `false`, the object always looks up role membership using the role provider. 物件來加密及解密所識別的 cookie 中快取的角色資訊根據。The object encrypts and decrypts role information cached in the cookie identified by the based on the .

summary.span: 建立 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: if the list of role names cached with the object has been modified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回`true`抓取從預設角色的角色名稱之後所快取中加入和方法，或當方法呼叫方法預設角色提供者，但收到的回應`true`，產生的角色名稱傳遞給方法新增至快取。The property will return `true` after role names have been retrieved from the default role and added to the cache by the method, or when the method calls the method of the default role provider and then receives a response of `true`, resulting in the role name passed to the method being added to the cache. 屬性也會傳回為 true，則如果設`true`和已經過期，導致 新所設定。The property will also return true if is set to `true` and the has passed, resulting in a new being set. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示目前使用者的角色快取的資訊，如果已啟用角色管理。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 如需啟用角色管理的資訊，請參閱類別。For information on enabling role management, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/getroleinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/getroleinfovb.aspx#1)]

The default is /.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性傳回的值`cookiePath`ASP.NET 應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中的屬性。The property returns the value of the `cookiePath` attribute from the Web.config file for your ASP.NET application. 如需有關 cookie 路徑的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on cookie paths, see . ## Examples 下列範例會顯示目前使用者的角色快取的資訊，如果已啟用角色管理。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 如需啟用角色管理的資訊，請參閱類別。For information on enabling role management, see the class. summary.span: 取得 所屬的角色清單。

span.span: Gets a list of roles that the is a member of.
The list of roles that the is a member of.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果是`true`和角色名稱已由使用者快取，然後在方法會傳回使用者所屬的快取中的角色名稱的清單。If is `true` and role names have been cached for the user represented by the , then the method will return the list of role names in the cache that the user is a member of. 如果沒有已快取角色名稱，然後在方法會傳回角色名稱的清單，使用者會從預設角色的成員。If role names have not been cached, then the method returns the list of role names that the user is a member of from the default role . 只有在目前的角色名稱會傳回。Only role names for the current are returned. 若要判斷角色名稱是否已快取中物件，檢查屬性。To determine whether role names have been cached in the object, check the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示登入的使用者角色的成員。The following code example displays the roles that the logged-on user is a member of. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/GetRolescs.aspx#7)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/GetRolesvb.aspx#7)]

[!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/getroleinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/getroleinfovb.aspx#1)]

span.span: The role to search for.

summary.span: 取得值，指出 表示的使用者是否在指定的角色中。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the user represented by the is in the specified role.

returns.span: 如果 表示的使用者在指定的角色中，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if user represented by the is in the specified role; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會先檢查屬性來判斷是否可以使用目前使用者的角色名稱的快取的清單。 first checks the property to determine whether a cached list of role names for the current user is available. 如果屬性是`true`，快取的清單會檢查指定的角色。If the property is `true`, the cached list is checked for the specified role. 如果方法快取的清單中找到指定的角色，它會傳回`true`。If the method finds the specified role in the cached list, it returns `true`. 如果找不到指定的角色，它會呼叫方法的預設來判斷是否已設定資料來源的角色相關聯的使用者名稱的執行個體值。If does not find the specified role, it calls the method of the default instance to determine whether the user name is associated with a role from the data source for the configured value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查登入的使用者是否在系統管理員角色中，然後才允許使用者檢視的使用者角色。The following code example checks to see whether the logged-on user is in the Administrators role before allowing the user to view user roles. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/ViewRolescs.aspx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/ViewRolesvb.aspx#8)]

span.span: The property is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsRoleListCached As Boolean
public: property bool IsRoleListCached { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出是否已在 Cookie 中快取使用者的角色清單。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the list of roles for the user has been cached in a cookie.

value.span: 如果已在 Cookie 中快取角色名稱，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if role names are cached in a cookie; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`cacheRolesInCookie`屬性在 Web.config 檔案中的應用程式設定為`true`，則核取特定角色的使用者成員資格時 cookie 寫入目前使用者的角色名稱的清單。If the `cacheRolesInCookie` attribute in the Web.config file for the application is set to `true`, then a list of role names for the current user is written to a cookie when user membership in a particular role is checked. 屬性會指出角色名稱是否已寫入至 cookie。The property indicates whether role names have been written to the cookie. 請注意，即使`cacheRolesInCookie`組態屬性可能是`true`、屬性不會傳回`true`直到角色資訊已寫入 cookie 之後。Note that, even though the `cacheRolesInCookie` configuration attribute may be `true`, the property does not return `true` until after role information has been written to the cookie. 如果沒有角色會檢查使用者時，不會執行會傳回`false`。If no role checks are performed for a user, will return `false`. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示目前使用者的角色快取的資訊，如果已啟用角色管理。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 如需啟用角色管理的資訊，請參閱類別。For information on enabling role management, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/getroleinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/getroleinfovb.aspx#1)]

public: property DateTime IssueDate { DateTime get(); };

span.span: Gets the date and time that the roles cookie was issued.
The that the roles cookie was issued.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會顯示目前使用者的角色快取的資訊，如果已啟用角色管理。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 如需啟用角色管理的資訊，請參閱類別。For information on enabling role management, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/getroleinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/getroleinfovb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ProviderName As String
public: property System::String ^ ProviderName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得角色提供者的名稱，用於儲存和擷取使用者的角色資訊。

span.span: Gets the name of the role provider that stores and retrieves role information for the user.

value.span: 角色提供者的名稱，用於儲存和擷取使用者的角色資訊。

span.span: The name of the role provider that stores and retrieves role information for the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會公開管理所表示的使用者角色資訊的角色提供者名稱物件。The property exposes the name of the role provider that manages the role information for the user represented by the object. 這可讓您藉由存取使用者特定的角色提供者執行個體屬性不論提供者是應用程式的預設提供者的類別。This enables you to access the specific role-provider instance for a user by using the property of the class regardless of whether the provider is the default provider for the application. 例如，您可以建立採用的方法做為輸入，並傳回表示使用者角色的清單。For example, you may create a method that takes a as input and returns the list of roles for the represented user. 您可以確保適當的角色提供者用來傳回角色清單藉由呼叫方法角色提供者從編製索引的集合屬性值。You can ensure that the appropriate role provider is used to return the list of roles for the by calling the method of the role provider from the collection that is indexed by the property value. 若要填入物件每個要求都必須使用應用程式的 Global.asax 檔中定義的事件處理常式。To populate the object for each request, you must use a event handler defined in the Global.asax file for the application.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetDirty() cil managed

summary.span: 將快取的角色清單標記為已變更。

span.span: Marks the cached role list as having been changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會標示為已變更設定的快取的角色清單至`true`和至`false`。The method marks the cached role list as having been changed by setting to `true` and to `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個成員是明確介面成員實作。This member is an explicit-interface member implementation. 只有在 執行個體轉換成 介面時，才能使用這個成員。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.

summary.span: 傳回使用 物件快取的角色資訊，該資訊根據 進行加密。

returns.span: 使用 物件快取的角色資訊，該資訊根據 進行加密。

span.span: The role information cached with the object encrypted based on the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所傳回的值方法會儲存在角色 cookie 時是`true`。The value returned by the method is stored in the roles cookie when is `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將結果的角色 cookie 的方法。The following code example writes the results of the method to the roles cookie. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/snippetscs.aspx#6)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/snippetsvb.aspx#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Integer
public: property int Version { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得角色 Cookie 的版本號碼。

span.span: Gets the version number of the roles cookie.

value.span: 角色 Cookie 的版本號碼。

span.span: The version number of the roles cookie.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由加入角色 cookie 中的版本號碼，未來版本的 ASP.NET 可以修改角色 cookie 的格式，並使用屬性來區別不同的格式。By including a version number in the roles cookie, future releases of ASP.NET can modify the format of the roles cookie and use the property to distinguish between different formats. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示目前使用者的角色快取的資訊，如果已啟用角色管理。The following example displays role-caching information for the current user if role management is enabled. 如需啟用角色管理的資訊，請參閱類別。For information on enabling role management, see the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/CS/getroleinfocs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.RolePrincipal/VB/getroleinfovb.aspx#1)]
